template: urisourcebin uri="{source[uri]}" ! queue ! decodebin ! videoconvert name="videoconvert" ! video/x-raw ! videocrop name="videocrop" ! queue leaky=upstream ! gvadetect device=CPU model="{models[object_detection][1][network]}" model-proc="{models[object_detection][1][proc]}" name="detection" ! gvametaconvert name="metaconvert" source="{source[uri]}" add-empty-results=true ! queue ! gvametapublish name="metapublish" address="{destination[host]}" topic="{destination[topic]}" timeout=1000 ! queue ! appsink name=appsink
